title: Monsters vs Robots v1.2
description:
Monsters vs. Robots is a fun application that contains a book and several interactive games for fun.

With an exciting narration written and spoken in English and Portuguese , the story chronicles the conflict of Nino, a small boy who uses imagination to overcome the problem of sleeping in the dark.

Features:

- Interactive Book 10 pages , with an average of 2 scenes per page , totaling more than 20 interactive scenes. 
- Combined with the power of interactivity , a beautiful story that shows that anything is possible with imagination. 
- Application in English and Portuguese , with narration written and spoken with a funny performance . 
- 30 puzzle to assemble and find the names of monsters and robots. 
- Various interactive elements with fun animations and sounds stimulants spread throughout the application . 
- Look for the hidden dream's stars throughout the app to reveal surprises! 
- More than 30 unique characters super colorful and expressive. 
- An application made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹fondly thought to the small , which will stimulate learning, reading, taking full advantage of the multimedia capabilities of your device

Education:
 
An interactive book that works the imaginary world of the child. The story relates the fear of the dark and its representation on children's emotional. 

The book develops in children a love of reading using a simple narrative with images super colorful and captivating.

The puzzle stimulates visual perception and logic, and motor skills of the child. The application awakens curiosity in children with various interactions scattered across all pages.

Discover this new way to interact with your child!
